persona: The persona block should specify a fictional or role-based identity for the AI to adopt when responding to prompt. The persona should be tightly related to the intended task and goal. For example, for a more academic summary, one can ask the model to be a research assistant.
context: The context block should provide external information or additional context that can steer the model to better responses.
constraints: The constraint block should specify any requirements or limitations for the AI to follow. Make sure the requirements are very specific to the intended task and goal.
data: The data block should use delimiters like triple quotation marks, XML tags, section titles, etc. to clearly indicate which part of the prompt is data.
